name: wtfport
description: A CLI tool for monitoring and managing network ports - Kill ports like a boss

scripts.build:binary:all: npm run build:binary:win && npm run build:binary:macos && npm run build:binary:linux
scripts.build:binary:win: npm run build:bundle && pkg dist/cli-bundle.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output ./bin/wtfport-win-x64.exe
scripts.build:binary:macos: npm run build:bundle && pkg dist/cli-bundle.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output ./bin/wtfport-macos-x64; pkg dist/cli-bundle.js --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output ./bin/wtfport-macos-arm64
scripts.build:binary:linux: npm run build:bundle && pkg dist/cli-bundle.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output ./bin/wtfport-linux-x64
